page.title: 20Family Firms in Debenham.
page.content:
In 1650,Timothy Abbott,a cordwainer, came to Debenham and set up a business. This passed from father to son until 1949 when it passed by marriage to the Turner family.Now a large self-service grocery and hardware store,it is still known as "Abbotts". In 1850,Robert List started a horse bus carrier business between Debenham and Ipswich.His son Ernest introduced the first motorbus service to Ipswich. Today,one of Debenham's garages is owned by the family. ****************
This survey was compiled by children and staff of
Sir Robert Hitcham's Primary School
Debenham.
